feed.title: Colanode Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update mutations and readme files in scripts by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/67
  • Fix select option settings popover trigger by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/69
  • Minor UI improvements in databases by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/70
  • Fix calendar view grid by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/74
  • Fix web Dockerfile to make sure assets are included by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/75
  • Make sure AvatarFallback has the size prop defined as required by @eljonny in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/77
  • Improve avatars loading by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/79
  • Win32 local file path URI preprocessing by @eljonny in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/76

New Contributors

  • @eljonny made their first contribution in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/77

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.2...v0.2.3

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add license, discord and twitter badges in readme by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/80
  • Implement pre-aggregated counters for users, nodes and upload storageâ€¦ by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/82
  • Implement undo & redo for document editor by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/83
  • Add background jobs to merge document & node updates by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/90
  • Add Helm charts for Kubernetes self-hosting by @ylber-gashi in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/87
  • Rename github workflows by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/91
  • Improve workspace users invite input by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/92
  • Update packages by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/94

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.3...v0.2.4

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix docker compose path in readme by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/100
  • Add unread states in sidebar menu by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/106
  • Implement save file by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/108
  • Fixes in document and node updates merge jobs by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/109
  • Add docs how to run Colanode locally by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/110
  • Close file tab on delete by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/111
  • Update packages by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/112
  • Add placeholders for password inputs by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/113

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.4...v0.2.5

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Preview audio files by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/114
  • Reorder space children in sidebar by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/115
  • Allow database name field update by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/116

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.5...v0.2.6

entry.title: New release for Colanode: v0.2.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Filter and sort by name by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/117
  • Fix code block renderer by @hakanshehu in https://github.com/colanode/colanode/pull/119

Full Changelog: https://github.com/colanode/colanode/compare/v0.2.6...v0.2.7
